scripts.release-patch: npm version patch && git add package.json && git commit -m 'chore(release): version bump [skip ci]'
scripts.release-minor: npm version minor && git add package.json && git commit -m 'chore(release): version bump [skip ci]'
scripts.release-major: npm version major && git add package.json && git commit -m 'chore(release): version bump [skip ci]'
